languages.text: "Сестра, опустите оружие!" {n}Несмотря на приказной тон, голос Абеляра звучит не слишком уверенно — старый офицер во все глаза смотрит на {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, на его щеке дергается мускул.{/n} "Угроза Лорд-капитану — выходка, выходящая за всякие рамки..."

traits.locale_text: "Сестра, опустите оружие!" {n}Несмотря на приказной тон, голос Абеляра звучит не слишком уверенно — старый офицер во все глаза смотрит на {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, на его щеке дергается мускул.{/n} "Угроза Лорд-капитану — выходка, выходящая за всякие рамки..."

languages.text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."
languages.original_text: "Сестра, опустите оружие!" {n}Несмотря на приказной тон, голос Абеляра звучит не слишком уверенно — старый офицер во все глаза смотрит на {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, на его щеке дергается мускул.{/n} "Угроза Лорд-капитану — выходка, выходящая за всякие рамки..."

traits.locale_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle on his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

"Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle on his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

"Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

"Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

"Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

languages.text: “修女，快把武器放下！”{n}尽管阿贝拉德的语气充满了命令的意味，但他的话语似乎并不是很有信心。此刻，他正盯着{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。你注意到，他脸颊上的肌肉在抽搐着。{/n}“威胁领主舰长是骇人听闻的恶行……”
languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

traits.locale_text: “修女，快把武器放下！”{n}尽管阿贝拉德的语气充满了命令的意味，但他的话语似乎并不是很有信心。此刻，他正盯着{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。你注意到，他脸颊上的肌肉在抽搐着。{/n}“威胁领主舰长是骇人听闻的恶行……”

languages.text: «¡Hermana, baje el arma!». {n}A pesar de su tono imperioso, Abelard no parece muy confiado... Cuando mira a la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, notas que uno de los músculos de su carrillo tiene un tic.{/n} «Amenazar a la Lord Capitán es un ultraje...».
languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Hermana, baje el arma!». {n}A pesar de su tono imperioso, Abelard no parece muy confiado... Cuando mira a la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, notas que uno de los músculos de su carrillo tiene un tic.{/n} «Amenazar a la Lord Capitán es un ultraje...».

languages.text: 「シスター、武器を下ろしなさい！」{n}命令的な口調にもかかわらず、アベラルドはあまり自信がある様子ではない。彼は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}を見つめており、頬の筋肉がピクピクしているのが見て取れる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンを脅すなんて、とんでもない…」
languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、武器を下ろしなさい！」{n}命令的な口調にもかかわらず、アベラルドはあまり自信がある様子ではない。彼は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}を見つめており、頬の筋肉がピクピクしているのが見て取れる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンを脅すなんてとんでもない…」
「シスター、武器を下ろしなさい！」{n}命令的な口調にもかかわらず、アベラルドはあまり自信がある様子ではない。彼は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}を見つめており、頬の筋肉がピクピクしているのが見て取れる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンを脅すなんて、とんでもない…」

languages.text: « Baissez votre arme, ma sœur ! » {n}Malgré son ton autoritaire, Abélard ne semble pas sûr de lui... Vous voyez les muscles de sa joue tressaillir tandis qu'il dévisage la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}.{/n} « Menacer la seigneure-capitaine est un outrage... »
languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

traits.locale_text: « Baissez votre arme, ma sœur ! » {n}Malgré son ton autoritaire, Abélard ne semble pas sûr de lui... Vous voyez les muscles de sa joue tressaillir tandis qu'il dévisage la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}.{/n} « Menacer la seigneure-capitaine est un outrage... »

languages.text: "Schwester, Ihr senkt sofort Eure Waffe!" {n}Trotz seines Befehlstons klingt Abelard nicht sonderlich selbstsicher – er starrt die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} an, und du bemerkst ein Muskelzucken in seiner Wange.{/n} "Den Lord Captain zu bedrohen, ist unerhört ..."
languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester, Ihr senkt sofort Eure Waffe!" {n}Trotz seines Befehlstons klingt Abelard nicht sonderlich selbstsicher – er starrt die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} an, und du bemerkst ein Muskelzucken in seiner Wange.{/n} "Den Lord Captain zu bedrohen, ist unerhört ..."

languages.text: "İndir silahını Rahibe!" {n}Abelard'ın sesi, emredici tonuna rağmen pek kendinden emin gelmiyor. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'e{/g} bakarken adamın yanağındaki bir kasın seğirdiğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ı tehdit etmek çizgiyi aşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."

traits.locale_text: "İndir silahını Rahibe!" {n}Abelard'ın sesi, emredici tonuna rağmen pek kendinden emin gelmiyor. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'e bakarken adamın yanağındaki bir kasın seğirdiğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ı tehdit etmek çizgiyi aşıyor."

languages.original_text: "Sister, you will lower your weapon!" {n}Despite his commanding tone, Abelard does not sound too confident — he is staring at the Rogue Trader, and you notice a muscle in his cheek twitching.{/n} "Threatening the Lord Captain is outrageous..."
